text: Question about custom repos for artifacts: I use `--deploy=jstrube/repo_jll.jl` to copy artifacts to my own github instead of JuliaBinaryWrappers. How do I tell Pkg to get them from there? The docs talk about an Override.toml, but the example looks like it's for the case where a binarybuilder project depends on another artifact. Does Override.toml also work for the case where a normal Julia package depends on the artifact? In that case I just pass the http link for the repo? I'm not sure I grok the example...

Does Override.toml also work for the case where a normal Julia package depends on the artifact? In that case I just pass the http link for the repo? I'm not sure I grok the example...
